title: "Project uses AI and archaeological materials for network analyses from the Middle Stone Age to antiquity"
excerpt: "Publishing in the international journal Antiquity, a team of archaeologists from seven countries led by Kiel University has presented the \"Big Exchange\" project, which uses AI to better understand the networks and interactions of prehistoric and early historic people."
